item.title: HTB - Spectra
item.description: Spectra Contents Write Up Recon Credentials Notes Write Up Initial scan shows three open ports, 22, 80, and 3306. The web port takes us to a temporary looking page that offers a link to a wordpress site and says to use that until they get Jira set up. Another link on the page takes us to an error message saying that a database connection could not be established.
